name: Docxtend
tagline: Xtend annotations to create object builders
body:
Xtend active annotations which helps to create object builders

org.mv.docxtend_ is the feature. Do an "export deployabe Feature" to create the p2 update site.

org.mv.docxtend is the main plugin containing the annotation definition ... in fact the file XtendTree.xtend is the only one you need to create builders.

org.mv.docxtend.tools contains tools and eclipse documentation.

org.mv.docxtend.eclipse.... are lazy builders that can be used

org.mv.alpha is a sample using the eclipse builders

Let me know if it's usefull

see also www.matthieu-vidal.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
